original_text:
By day the Lord commands his steadfast love,
    and at night his song is with me,
    a prayer to the God of my life.
korean_text: 낮에는 여호와께서 그의 인자하심을 베푸시고 밤에는 그의 찬송이 내게 있어 생명의 하나님께 기도하리로다

sentences.original_text: By day the Lord commands his steadfast love
and at night his song is with me
sentences.korean_translation: 밤에는 그 노래가 나와 함께 있으니

sentences.original_text: a prayer to the God of my life
